mapper.sql: id, cagent, qq, wechat, qqcode, wechatcode, customer, website
mapper.insert: insert into t_contact_config (id, cagent, qq, wechat, qqcode, wechatcode, customer, website) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
cagent,
qq,

website,

mapper.update:
update t_contact_config
cagent = #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qqcode = #{qqcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechatcode = #{wechatcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_contact_config set cagent = #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qqcode = #{qqcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechatcode = #{wechatcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_contact_config where cagent=#{cagent} group by cagent
